title: Streamixio
author: Streamixio
content: ROYALMN❖ The world's most stable mining platform RoyalMn➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖You can mine without buying a mining machine. More and more people choose RoyalMn for mining. RoyalMn is one of the world's leading cryptocurrency mining platforms. This platform provides one-stop mining services and 24-hour continuous automatic mining. , the income is clearly visible, the mining income is extracted every day without any handling fee, professional teaching is provided, and novices can participate. We have more than 8 years of experience in blockchain technology to solve the mining problem for users, you just need to Click to place an order, and users can quickly get benefits. User benefits on the RoyalMn platform are more transparent and authentic. The income generated every day can be directly settled into the user's balance, and can be withdrawn at any time. The operation is simple, the income is transparent, and the professional operation and maintenance team and broader development space. Welcome to RoyalMn!Website: https://www.royalmn.live

comments.author: ABCbits
comments.created_time: May 22, 2022, 11:31:47 AMLast edit: May 23, 2022, 09:34:34 AM by ETFbitcoin
comments.body: OP, are you part of royalmn? Your post indicate you're here to announce this service rather than discuss about this service. Either way, with criteria mentioned by Puppet shows this service is another probable scam/ponzi cloud mining.Quote from: Puppet on November 30, 2014, 12:39:32 PM1) No public mining address / no user selectable pool.2) No endorsement from any asic vendor3) No relevant pictures of their hardware and datacenter4) Open ended IPO / fractional reverse mining risk5) Referral programs and social networking6) Anonymous operators7) No exit strategy8 ) Bonus point for "guaranteed profit"1. True?. The section "HOW ROYALMN Mining WORKS?" and "Information" section doesn't mention anything about it.2. True?. If any ASIC vendor endorse this service, the main page should already state about it.3. True?. The main page doesn't mention anything about proof of their hardware.4. True?. There's no mention how much plan/hashrate you could buy.5. True. The main page state "Powerful Referral Program."6. True. Most field is "REDACTED FOR PRIVACY" according to https://who.is/whois/royalmn.live.7. True?. The website doesn't mention anything about selling mining plans.8. True. The main page state "We offer a variety of profitable mining solutions".

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: I signed up using a fake email and guess what? Once you sign in to the royalmnapp.com site , there is no homepage, just a QR code you have to scam using your phone in order to download some untrusted app that I believe could be malware. Along the download link are some fake stats like 3.42 Million Installations, review score of 4.9 from 19K reviewers   Very stupid scammersQuote from: Streamixio on May 21, 2022, 04:29:09 PMWe have more than 8 years of experience in blockchain technology to solve the mining problem for users,Both domains were registered in March 2022. So where do you get the 8 years from?Code:Domain:royalmnapp.comRegistrar:Gname.com Pte. Ltd.Registered On:2022-03-23Expires On:2023-03-23Updated On:2022-03-23Code:Domain:royalmn.liveRegistrar:GoDaddy.com, LLCRegistered On:2022-03-03Expires On:2023-03-03Updated On:2022-03-08

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: ETFbitcoin on May 23, 2022, 09:37:04 AMTo be fair, they could steal more data from Android application than Browser . But did the QR code lead you to google play store or APK file from their own website?It's just an APK file that's hosted on their website. I used my old device to visit the website and didn't even download the app. I am certain it's a malware of sorts.
